attributes.action: We need a vote on proposals for exiting the EU before implementing article 50
attributes.additional_details:
The campaigners for voting leave in the recent referendum, never described credible or viable policies to be implemented in the event of the success of vote leave. 
It would appear that the issues regarding immigration were critical in the successful result for voting leave, but now appears that this was disingenuous. 
It is clear that there are no viable policies currently proposed, so the country should be consulted on what the proposals are, before applying to leave the EU.
attributes.background: We were misled by the vote leave campaign,  more emphasis was put on immigration than may be ultimately possible for a successful exit from the EU
